item.title: 2025 Video Game Release Date Calendar
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Games in January 2025
  • Games In February 2025
  • Games in March 2025
  • Games in April 2025
  • Games in May 2025
  • Games in June 2025
  • Games in July 2025
  • Games in August 2025
  • Games in September 2025
  • Games in October 2025
  • Games in November 2025
  • Games in December 2025
  • Big TBA 2025 Releases

Readers can use this handy dandy gaming release date calendar for 2025 to keep track of the prominent titles coming out. We'll be keeping this post updated as more video game release dates are announced, so make sure to keep this page bookmarked.

Updated on August 28, 2025

---

Solo Leveling: Arise Overdrive comes to PC on November 17. Console versions will come in 2026.

Bubble Bobble Sugar Dungeons comes out on November 27.

Skate will be free to play and comes out on September 16.

Baby Steps has been delayed to September 23.

Lumines Arise launches on November 11.

Little Witch in the Woods is delayed to September 15.

Check out our Interactive 2025 Release Date Calendar here!

item.title: NBA 2K26: Best Players, Ranked
item.description:
Gamers and NBA players alike always look to the next chapter of 2K Sports' basketball simulator for updates on player ratings for the incoming season. A lot of thought goes into these ratings, and much of it is dependent upon both individual and team performances from the previous season.

In NBA 2K26 , the formula in this regard is much the same, so many are eager to find out how their favorite players stack up against the competition. Below, you will find the 100 highest-rated players in NBA 2K26 , along with the teams they'll be playing for in the 2025-26 season, and their overall rating.

The Highest-Ranked Players in NBA 2K26

From guards, to forwards, to centers, the team behind NBA 2K26 has carefully considered the performances and form of all players in the league and rated them in comparison to one another. At the top of the mountain for this year is Denver's Nikola Jokic , with an overall rating of 98. The second-highest rated for 2K26 is the league's reigning MVP Shai Gilgeous-Alexander , who also enjoys an OVR of 98.

Below are the top 100 players for NBA 2K26 .

Who Are The Best Guards in NBA 2K26?

The highest-rated guard in 2K26 is Shai Gilgeous-Alexander , who sits at the top of the ladder with a 98 OVR. He is in elite company, however, with the likes of Luka Doncic (95), Anthony Edwards (95), Steph Curry (94), Donovan Mitchell (93), Jalen Brunson (93), and Tyrese Halliburton (93) all with impressive ratings for this year.

Who Are The Best Forwards in NBA 2K26?

Milwaukee's Giannis Antetokounmpo is king of the forwards this year, but is closely tailed by some incredibly talented names. Behind the Greek Freak are 23-year-veteran LeBron James (94), Jayson Tatum (94), new Rocket Kevin Durant (93), and Kawhi Leonard (92) from the Clippers.

Who Are The Best Centers in NBA 2K26?

Unsurprisingly, the multi-time league MVP Nikola Jokic is at the top of Centers for this year (and likely for years to follow), and is joined by a strong mix of both young and older big men. Behind Jokic are Victor Wembanyama (94), Anthony Davis (93), Joel Embiid (92), and Karl Anthony-Towns (92).

The "best" for each position is determined by their regular allocation. While Giannis, for example, can play Center, he is better known for his role as a Power Forward.
